full_summary:
Tender for Occupational and Industrial Hygienist Educator Service
==========================================================

### Notice of Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the provision of occupational and industrial hygienist educator services.

### Tender Details

| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | Occupational and Industrial Hygienist Educator |
| **Reference Number** | WS4324033438 |
| **Bid Closing Date** | December 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST |
| **Publication Date** | November 29, 2023 |

### Description of Work

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a qualified individual to provide on-site industrial or occupational hygiene instructions for their Preventive Medicine Technician Qualification Level 6A course to be held at Canadian Forces Base Borden, Ontario with the option to instruct an additional 2 serials of this course in the next 4 years.

### Contact Information

* Name: Sabrina Cheng, PSPC
* Email: [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on December 14, 2023 by 2:00 PM EST.
* Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders from Canada and trade agreement partners, including:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* ...and 11 other trade agreements.

The tender is for educational and training services, with a procurement category of SRV (Service). 
Please note that some dates in the original text should be reformatted to conform to proper English usage (e.g. "Winter, 1701") would be submitted as "Winter of the year 1701"). Therefore, the "2023-11-29" and others follow the new markdown format and are also reformatted. Here are the changes:
- 2023-11-29 -> November 29, 2023
- 2028-07-31 -> July 31, 2028
- 2023-12-14T14:00:00 -> [December 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST]()
